Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: (Nyasaye)Naboola mbu; “Ewe Ibilisi obele orie olabeele halala nende abenaame?”
Naboola; “Shenyala okhwinamila Omundu wawaloonga khuliloba eliumu lirusinjia -omwoyo- isauti, elirula khu matoyi karebwakhwo ifwani tawe.”
(Nyasaye) Naboola mbu; “ rula omo, oli omutsube’’
Ne toto oli nende eshilamo shianje okhula inyanga yeyindukho.”
Naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wanje Omulesi! Mbelesie obwiyangu okhula inyanga yabalilamusibwa”
(Nyasaye) Naboola mbu; “toto ewe olimubalia bahebwa obwiyangu
Okhula inyanga yebise bimanyishe biarebwaho .”
Naboola;“Nyasayewanje!shingalawambusilia okhukora nditsa okhubaronela(abandu) khushialo ne nditsa okhubakosia boosi.”
Halali Abasumba bobo abatswenufu”
(Nyasaye) naboola mbu “ino ni injila yokhwitsa ewanje ingololofu”
“Ne toto Abandu banje ewe sholaba nende obunyali khubo tawe, halali balia abakori bakhulondakhwo
Ne toto Jahannam niho habundu wabu, wabakasilibwa bosi
Ili nende emiliango saba, nebuli omuliango kuli nende ebuleka yakabulwa
Toto balia baria Nyasaye baliba mumikunda nende tsisebele
“Injilemwo mushironyo nomulembe”
Ne khulirusia amakhonye akali mubilifu biabu, ne baliba (shinga) Abananda nibekhale khubisala biobwami nibahengana
Shibulibatilakhwo obuchong’e bwosi bwosi omo tawe, ne shibalirusibwamwo tawe
Boolela Abasumba banje mbu esie nesie Owobulesheli obunji Owetsimbabaasi muno
Ne eshinyasio shianje nisho eshinyasio eshilulu muno
Ne baboolele amakhuwa kabacheni ba Ibrahim
